import { Nav, NavItem, NavLink } from 'reactstrap' import { User, Lock, Info, Link, Bell } from 'react-feather' const Tabs = ({ activeTab, toggleTab }) => { return (
{/* toggleTab('1')}> Thông tin chung */} toggleTab('2')}> Đổi mật khẩu {/* toggleTab('3')}> Information toggleTab('4')}> Social toggleTab('5')}> Notifications */}
) } export default Tabs
